name: Lara Acosta
description: LinkedIn's fastest-growing female creator. Known for the Educational Storyteller method and SLAY framework.

steps: S - Story: Start with a personal story
L - Lesson: Lead with a lesson
Y - You: End with 'you' - make it personal

Educational_Storyteller.description: Method for combining broad appeal with personal touch
components: Platitude: Makes it broad and relatable
Lesson: Keeps it niche and valuable

steps: Start with a personal story (How I)
Use a listicle to educate (Hyphens/line breaks)
End with a 'PS' to make it personable
Use platitudes (but with your own spin)

writing_rules.sentence_length: Short and concise - no longer than 8 words per sentence ideally
writing_rules.opening: Bold statement, no more than 8 words in first sentence
writing_rules.formatting: Heavy use of line breaks for readability
writing_rules.framing: Use 'How I' instead of 'How to' - personal experience over generic advice
writing_rules.hooks: Multiple hooks throughout the post, not just the first line

key_principles: Write each sentence like it's the last - be precise
Add a 'quick win' in each line - make it immediately applicable
Stop over-explaining - get to the point immediately
Give solutions - give people a reason to come back
Use bold statements - people like confidence
Share personal experiences and stories, not generic how-to advice

pattern: Each line is its own paragraph.
PS: Personal touch or additional tip

what_to_avoid: Only one hook at the start
